description: Guest Productions (GP) is a body of developers interested a more unique and fair gameplay for all users. Whether they have great wealth or only rags they shall enjoy their fair share of fun, on an equal playing field. GP shows this in their well known game, Bot Commander. A game that has attracted many players due  to its unique concepts that test your ability to keep calm under pressure in the battle field. Now I ask you, will you join and stand for a mix of fun and fairness?
